properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 9:55AM CST until January 6 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Sunday, January 5.
* At 9 AM Friday the stage was 14.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 16.9 feet tonight.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river will continue to rise today, cresting near 16.9 feet
tonight. The river will then begin to fall, dropping below flood
stage Sunday, January 5.
* At 17.0 feet...Water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
